name: John Doe
briefReview: VS Code is a great product, I really like it!  VS Code is an amazing product that has been a great asset to my workflow. The user interface is incredibly intuitive and the features it offers are incredibly useful. I especially love the ability to customize my workspace and the ability to group my projects into workspaces. The syntax highlighting and auto-completion features are also a great help when coding.

name: Jane Alam
briefReview: VS Code is an amazing product I've been using VS Code for a few months and I find it to be an invaluable tool for my development work. The amount of features and options available make it extremely easy to customize my workflow. The debugging and code refactoring tools are especially useful for quickly identifying and resolving bugs.

name: Jack Smith
briefReview: I love VS Code, it has a lot of great features I have been using VS Code for a few months and I must say it is the perfect development environment for me. It has all the features I need and the user interface is so intuitive that I don't have to think too much about how to use it. The debugging tools are very helpful and the ability to group my projects into workspaces is great.

name: Jill Smith
briefReview: VS Code is okay, but could be better VS Code is an excellent product that has greatly improved my development workflow. The integrated debugging and code refactoring tools are incredibly useful and the syntax highlighting and auto-completion features make coding so much easier. The customizable workspace and the ability to group my projects into workspaces are great features.
